collections.name: ball_by_ball

properties.name: match_id
properties.description: Unique Number Which Identifies a match

properties.name: over_id
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies an over in an Innings

properties.name: ball_id
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies a ball in an over

properties.name: innings_no
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies an innings in a match

properties.name: team_batting
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies Batting team in a match

properties.name: team_bowling
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies Bowling team in a match

properties.name: striker_batting_position
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies the position in which player came into bat

properties.name: striker
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies the player who is on strike for that particular ball

properties.name: non_striker
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies the player who is Non-striker for that particular ball

properties.name: bowler
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies the player who is Bowling that particular ball

collections.description: Contains ball-by-ball details for each match, including batting and bowling teams, striker, non-striker, and bowler information.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The match is made up of two innings and each team takes a turn at batting and bowling. An innings is made up of 50 overs. An over involves six deliveries from the bowler.

collections.name: batsman_scored

properties.name: match_id
properties.description: Unique Number Which Identifies a match

properties.name: over_id
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies an over in an Innings

properties.name: ball_id
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies a ball in an over

properties.name: runs_scored
properties.description: Number of Runs scored by the batsman

properties.name: innings_no
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies an innings in a match

collections.description: Records the runs scored by a batsman for each ball in a match.

collections.name: batting_style

properties.name: batting_id
properties.description: unique id for batting hand

properties.name: batting_hand
properties.description: the batting hand: left or right

collections.description: Defines the different batting styles, such as left-hand or right-hand bat.

collections.name: bowling_style

properties.name: bowling_id
properties.description: unique id for bowling style

properties.name: bowling_skill
properties.description: the bowling skill

collections.description: Defines the different bowling skills or styles.

collections.name: city

properties.name: city_id
properties.description: unique id for city

properties.name: city_name
properties.description: city name

properties.name: country_id
properties.description: id of country

collections.description: Stores information about cities, including their country.

collections.name: country

properties.name: country_id
properties.description: unique id for country

properties.name: country_name
properties.description: country name

collections.description: Stores information about countries.

collections.name: extra_runs

properties.name: match_id
properties.description: Unique Number Which Identifies a match

properties.name: over_id
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies an over in an Innings

properties.name: ball_id
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies a ball in an over

properties.name: extra_type_id
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies extra type

properties.name: extra_runs
properties.description: Number of extra runs

properties.name: innings_no
properties.description: Unique Number which Identifies an innings in a match

collections.description: Records extra runs awarded during a match, such as wides or no-balls.

collections.name: extra_type

properties.name: extra_id
properties.description: unique id for extra type

properties.name: extra_name
properties.description: extra type name

collections.description: Defines the types of extra runs that can be awarded.

collections.name: match

properties.name: match_id
properties.description: unique id for match

properties.name: team_1
properties.description: the team id of the first team

properties.name: team_2
properties.description: the team id for the second team

properties.name: match_date
properties.description: the date of the match

properties.name: season_id
properties.description: the id of the season

properties.name: venue_id
properties.description: the id of the venue where the match held

properties.name: toss_winner
properties.description: the id of the toss winner

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The toss winner is a term used in cricket and is the team that wins the heads or tails toss of coin at the beginning of a match which then enables the team captain to decide whether to bat or bowl first on the pitch.

properties.name: toss_decide
properties.description: the decision (batting or bowling) made after winning the toss

properties.name: win_type
properties.description: the id of the winning type

properties.name: win_margin
properties.description: the points of the winning margin

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: A winning margin bet is a wager on the final result of a game, within a certain range of points.

properties.name: outcome_type
properties.description: the id of the outcome type

properties.name: match_winner
properties.description: the team id of the match winner

properties.name: man_of_the_match
properties.description: the id of the man of the match

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: In team sport, a player of the match or man (or woman) of the match award is often given to the outstanding player in a particular match.

collections.description: Contains detailed information about each match, including teams, date, venue, toss results, and the final outcome.

collections.name: out_type

properties.name: out_id
properties.description: unique id for out type

properties.name: out_name
properties.description: out type name

collections.description: Defines the different ways a player can be out (e.g., caught, bowled).

collections.name: outcome

properties.name: outcome_id
properties.description: unique id for outcome

properties.name: outcome_type
properties.description: type of the outcome

collections.description: Defines the possible outcomes of a match, such as 'Result' or 'No Result'.

collections.name: player

properties.name: player_id
properties.description: the id of the player

properties.name: player_name
properties.description: the name of the player

properties.name: dob
properties.description: player's birthday

properties.name: batting_hand
properties.description: the id of the batting hand

properties.name: bowling_skill
properties.description: the id of the bowling skill

properties.name: country_name
properties.description: the name of the country where the player is from

collections.description: Stores information about each player, including their name, date of birth, and playing style.

collections.name: player_match

properties.name: match_id
properties.description: the id of the match

properties.name: player_id
properties.description: the id of the player

properties.name: role_id
properties.description: the id of the play's role in the match

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: if a player has multiple roles in a match, it means this player is versatile

properties.name: team_id
properties.description: the id of player's team

collections.description: Links players to the matches they participated in, specifying their team and role.

collections.name: role

properties.name: role_id
properties.description: the unique id for the role

properties.name: role_desc
properties.description: the role description

collections.description: Defines the roles a player can have in a match (e.g., Captain, Keeper).

collections.name: season

properties.name: season_id
properties.description: the unique id for season

properties.name: man_of_the_series
properties.description: the player id of man of the series

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: In team sport, a player of the series or man (or woman) of the series award is often given to the outstanding player in a particular series.

properties.name: orange_cap
properties.description: the player id who wins the orange cap

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The Orange Cap is a coveted award for a batter who is participating in the Indian Premier League (IPL)

properties.name: purple_cap
properties.description: the player id who wins the purple cap

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The Purple Cap is awarded to the bowler who has emerged as the leading wicket-taker in a particular edition of the high-profile Indian Premier League (IPL)

properties.name: season_year
properties.description: the year of the season

collections.description: Contains information about each season, including the season year and award winners.

collections.name: team

properties.name: team_id
properties.description: the unique id for the team

properties.name: team_name
properties.description: the team name

collections.description: Stores information about each team.

collections.name: toss_decision

properties.name: toss_id
properties.description: the unique id for the toss

properties.name: toss_name
properties.description: the toss decision name

collections.description: Defines the possible toss decisions (field or bat).

collections.name: umpire

properties.name: umpire_id
properties.description: the unique id of the umpire

properties.name: umpire_name
properties.description: umpire's name

properties.name: umpire_country
properties.description: the id of the country where the umpire are from

collections.description: Stores information about umpires, including their name and country.

collections.name: venue

properties.name: venue_id
properties.description: the unique id of the venue

properties.name: venue_name
properties.description: the name of the venue

properties.name: city_id
properties.description: the city id where the venue is located in

collections.description: Contains information about the venues where matches are played.

collections.name: wicket_taken

properties.name: match_id
properties.description: the id of the match

properties.name: over_id
properties.description: the id of the over in an inning

properties.name: ball_id
properties.description: the id of the ball in an over

properties.name: player_out
properties.description: the player id who got an out

properties.name: kind_out
properties.description: the id that represents the out type

properties.name: fielders
properties.description: the id of fielders

properties.name: innings_no
properties.description: number which identifies an innings in a match

collections.description: Records each wicket taken in a match, including the player out, how they were out, and any fielders involved.

collections.name: win_by

properties.name: win_id
properties.description: the unique id for the winning

properties.name: win_type
properties.description: the winning type

collections.description: Defines the ways a match can be won (e.g., by runs, by wickets).
